params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.image_uri
params.description: The URI to pull the container image from.

params.name: data.commands
params.description: Overrides the CMD specified in the container. If there is an ENTRYPOINT (either in the container image or with the entrypoint field below) then commands are appended as arguments to the ENTRYPOINT.

params.name: data.volumes
params.description: Volumes to mount (bind mount) from the host machine files or directories into the container, formatted to match docker run's --volume option, e.g. /foo:/bar, or /foo:/bar:ro

params.name: data.options
params.description: Arbitrary additional options to include in the "docker run" command when running this container, e.g. "--network host".

params.name: data.block_external_network
params.description: If set to true, external network access to and from container will be blocked. The container will use the default internal network 'goog-internal'.

params.name: data.username
params.description: Optional username for logging in to a docker registry. If username matches projects/*/secrets/*/versions/* then Batch will read the username from the Secret Manager.

params.name: data.password
params.description: Optional password for logging in to a docker registry. If password matches projects/*/secrets/*/versions/* then Batch will read the password from the Secret Manager;
